description: This file defines the interface for a simplistic FIFO queue implementation in C, including the queue structure, function prototypes for creating, destroying, manipulating, and iterating over the queue, as well as typedefs for function pointers used in custom item management.

methods.name: queueDestroy
methods.description: Destroys a queue instance and optionally frees contained items with a custom function.

methods.name: queueCount
methods.description: Returns the number of items in the queue.

methods.name: queuePush
methods.description: Appends an item to the end of the queue.

methods.name: queuePop
methods.description: Removes and returns the next item in the queue.

methods.name: queueDelete
methods.description: Deletes an item from the queue based on a comparison function.

methods.name: queueFind
methods.description: Finds an item in the queue matching a search value.

methods.name: queueIterate
methods.description: Iterates over all items, executing a callback function.

methods.name: queueClear
methods.description: Clears the queue, optionally freeing items with a custom function.
